content: this pattern is great for charity crochet projects preemie and newborn cap drives and as gifts designed using red heart with love yarn from my yarn stash and a 5 5 mm i sized hook the finished hat is soft and comfortable to wear you can substitute any medium weight yarn for this design like red heart super saver red heart ombre red heart stripes etc i have included instructions for 2 different lengths - to the base of the earlobe and mid-ear length the stitch repeat is made up of sets of 3 stitches v_stitch is made up of double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet and the pattern can be customized to any size using the ratio of 3 25 stitches per inch and 2 rounds per inch if you d like to make the hat longer add 2 additional repeat row for each inch extra you would like for length #redheartyarns #joycreators the child size used 40 g 74 75 yds of yarn to complete have fun with your yarn ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
